page.title: 16WEST END & LOCHARDIL FARMS
page.content: While exploring{LOCHARDIL}and{HOLM} we found, to our surprise, a very old farmhouse called{WEST END FARM.}There were hens and cockerels. We counted about 30, running all over the place so obviously someone lived there. The owner is a man in his seventies whose parents had farmed the place originally. As Lochardil became bigger more and more land was sold off until now he has only a few fields left. The crops which he used to grow were being damaged by children playing in the fields so he just keeps chickens and grows a few vegetables. He seemed sad about it. {LOCHARDIL FARM}was a collection of,empty buildings fenced off from the houses and was completely abandoned and locked. The farms have disappeared and more will disappear as houses are built.
